pilot.title: Pilot
pilot.shortDesc: Controls ship movement and evasive maneuvers
quickStart: Use the Evasive toggle to give -2 DM to incoming attacks
Set destination with Set Course to track travel progress
Use Pass Time to advance journey hours
Manage range bands to targets for optimal combat positioning
tips: Evasive maneuvers impose penalties on YOUR gunners too
Communicate with Captain before major course changes
Monitor fuel consumption during long journeys

captain.title: Captain
quickStart: Use Orders panel to direct crew actions
Set Alert Status (Normal/Battle Stations)
Authorize or restrict weapons free status
Review ship status and crew positions
tips: Clear communication prevents friendly fire
Battle Stations takes time to reach - plan ahead
Trust your specialists but stay informed

astrogator.title: Astrogator
quickStart: Use the Astrogation Map to view known space
Plot Jump calculates fuel and time requirements
Initiate Jump starts the 7-day jump cycle
Complete Jump on arrival to update location
tips: Always check fuel levels before plotting jumps
Unrefined fuel increases misjump risk
Gas giant refueling is free but takes time

engineer.title: Engineer
responsibilities: Repair damage during and after combat
quickStart: Monitor the Engineering panel for system status
Prioritize repairs: life support > drives > weapons
Report critical damage to Captain immediately
Track repair parts inventory
tips: M-Drive repairs restore maneuverability
J-Drive must be 100% for safe jump
Power plant damage reduces overall capacity

sensor_operator.title: Sensor Operator
quickStart: Use Passive Scan to detect transponders
Active Scan reveals ship type and weapons
Deep Scan exposes cargo and crew details
Mark hostile contacts for gunners
tips: Active scanning reveals your position too
Larger ships are easier to detect
Debris and asteroids can mask contacts

gunner.title: Gunner
quickStart: Wait for Weapons Free authorization
Select target from marked contacts
Choose weapon appropriate for range band
Fire and report results
tips: Pulse lasers are accurate, beam lasers do more damage
Missiles need time to reach target
Sandcasters are defensive only

damage_control.title: Damage Control
quickStart: Monitor damage alerts on DC panel
Prioritize: fires > hull breaches > equipment
Deploy emergency patches for hull damage
Coordinate with Engineer on major repairs
tips: Vacc suits are essential for hull work
Fire suppression uses limited consumables
Some damage requires dock facilities to fix

marines.title: Marines
quickStart: Deploy to defensive positions during Alert
Respond to breach alarms immediately
Coordinate with Captain for boarding ops
Maintain battle stations at airlocks
tips: Boarding is high-risk, high-reward
Zero-G combat requires special training
Surrender negotiations save lives

medic.title: Medic
quickStart: Set up triage during combat
Stabilize critical patients first
Use medkit supplies efficiently
Report casualty status to Captain
tips: Low berths can preserve critical patients
TL affects available medical options
Radiation exposure requires special treatment
